testcase.description:
Test login without password.
# 1. Setup and preparation
- Start session, open homepage and delete all visible cookies - Create new account with profile data
# 2. Scope of test
- Click login link in the header and go to the login page - Validate login page - Enter username, leave password empty and try to login - Validate present error message element
# 3. Clean up
- End session and clean up created cookies
